mapper.select: select count(*) from talent where talent_part like '%'||#{type}||'%'

select.if: SELECT TALENT_NO AS talentNo, TALENT_TITLE AS talentTitle, TALENT_WRITER AS talentWriter, TALENT_CONTENT AS talentContent, TALENT_COUNT AS talentCount, TALENT_PART AS talentPart, TALENT_FILENAME AS talentFilename, TALENT_FILENPATH AS talentFilepath, TALENT_ENROLL_DATE AS talentEnrollDate FROM TALENT
